name: Space Junker (RawMetal)
description: Considered to be the first game published, Space Junker is a simple Arcade Shooter created as a small project in getting my feet wet in game development. The player controls a ship surrounded by Space Debris and stars while being ambushed by hostile Aliens. The game ends when the player lost 3 lives and the high score is recorded. The score restarts as soon as the player close the website tab.
